issue.title: [CF 56] Bug when editing/viewing additional conditions
issue.body:
ATTATCHING A SAVED VARIABLE FILE WILL GET YOUR TICKET ANSWERED 200 TIMES FASTER

SAVED VARIABLE FILES CAN BE FOUND IN "World of Warcraft/WTF/Account/<ACOOUNTNAME>/<REALMNAME>/<CHARNAME>/SavedVariables/TellMeWhen. lua"

What steps will reproduce the problem?
Done on a Ret Pally:
1) Create icon for Templar's Verdict and add a condition of Holy Power Player equals 3
2) Create icon for Exorcism and add a condition Icon exists The Art of War
3) Save
4) Edit first icon to add a second condition of OR Icon exists Hand of Light
5) Save
6) View conditions on the first icon, then cancel
7) View conditions on the second icon --> the second condition from the first icon is displayed as well.
8) Cancel
9) Reload UI
10) View conditions for second icon -> all is as it should be again.

What is the expected output? What do you see instead?
Expect dialog to only show conditions attached to the specific icon
Seen "ghost" conditions from other icons viewed if they have more conditions than the icons viewed after it.

What version of the product are you using?
2.1.0

Do you have an error log of what happened?
No error log generated.

Please provide any additional information below.
It appears as if there is a counter of the number of additional conditions for an icon, and that counter is not getting reset when a new icon is viewed/edited.


> Posted by CurseForge user Pookhill | Imported from CurseForge issue #56 | Raw
